title: Cozy 1 Bed Cottage on Bowdish Lake Includes ALL utilities!
description: 1 Bed, 1 Bath ($1300) Includes all utilities for 1st year!
Relax in this quiet, smaller Cottage w/ 1- large Bedroom on the waterfront of Bowdish Lake today!

Enjoy camping grounds, hiking trails and with dock access you can kayak most the year and once winter comes switch over to snowmobiling too. Big chains like Walmart, Dunkin’ Donuts and Wendy's are only 6 miles away, local restaurants, bars and Wrights farm are nearby as well. Less than 1 hour from Providence and Warwick allow for an easy commute throughout the State and on your days off you can enjoy gorgeous sunrises and sunsets from your waterfront home!
***** Candidates must pre-qualify for a showing, so respond with your full name and number
